Eunsoo Kim

LINES

The Shining Spinning Lines

  Watch Video

This project is making a new space by projecting images onto spinning line.
Color on image projected onto moving object is split to RGB that is three primary light. It creates new visuals.

This project exhibited in Seoul Citizens Hall in 2014, organized by Seoul Foundation for Arts and Culture.

Private Work
by Eunsoo Kim
